description: "Bing" comes from Japanese "Gara" (Pattern). collecting goods of the same character.

examples.translation: Oh yeah, finally know how to pick patterns (merch)

examples.chinese: 我吃谷都挑柄,不是所有我推的柄我都溺爱的
examples.translation: When I buy goods I pick characters, I don't dote on every pattern of my push

examples.chinese: 想做一个痛包,但是手里面没有合适的柄图,我要挑柄吃
examples.translation: Want to make an Itabag, but don't have suitable images, I need to pick and buy
